types.html:
pied de nez m (plural pieds de nez)

  1. snook (disrespectful gesture, performed by placing the tip of a thumb on one's nose with the fingers spread, and typically while wiggling the fingers back and forth)
    faire un pied de nez à quelqu'un ― to cock a snook at someone
  2. (figuratively) act of defiance
    faire un pied de nez à quelqu'un ― to thumb one's nose at someone

title: pied de nez
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pje d(ə) ne/
